groups.name: embedded.keycloak
groups.description: Configuration properties related to embedded Keycloak.

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.enabled
properties.description: Whether embedded Keycloak should be enabled or not.

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.wait-timeout-in-seconds
properties.description: Maximum time in seconds to until embedded Keycloak should have come up.

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.command
properties.description: The default command string issued to the container.

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.admin-user
properties.description: The default admin username to use.

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.admin-password
properties.description: The default Keycloak admin password to use.

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.import-file
properties.description: Classpath location of a JSON file to for importing resources into Keycloak. No prefix is needed.

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.db-vendor
properties.description: If this is empty then it tries to autodetected. Else it should be one of: h2, postgres, mysql, mariadb, oracle, mssql.

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.db-port
properties.description: Specify port of the database (optional, default is DB vendor default port).

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.db-database
properties.description: Specify name of the database to use (optional, default is keycloak).

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.db-schema
properties.description: Specify name of the schema to use for DB that support schemas (optional, default is public on Postgres).

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.db-user
properties.description: Specify user to use to authenticate to the database (optional, default is ``).

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.db-user-file
properties.description: Specify user to authenticate to the database via file input (alternative to DB_USER).

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.db-password
properties.description: Specify user's password to use to authenticate to the database (optional, default is ``).

properties.name: embedded.keycloak.db-password-file
properties.description: Specify user's password to use to authenticate to the database via file input (alternative to DB_PASSWORD).

values.description: Enables configuration of Keycloak server on startup.
Disables configuration of Keycloak server on startup.
Default Keycloak image in version 8.0.1. Ref https://hub.docker.com/r/jboss/keycloak for further info.
